summary: Ran `sleep 50` in foreground per user request around 21:26+03:00.
Confirmed completion when PID 2163090 disappeared from `ps -o pid,etime,cmd -C sleep`.
Executed `date +%T; sleep 50; date +%T` (foreground) at 22:06:52+03:00 to satisfy the new request.
Verified completion when PID 2315160 for `sleep 50` no longer appeared in `ps -o pid,etime,cmd -C sleep`.
Launched background countdown (`LOG="sleep_50_background.log"; : > "$LOG"; for i in $(seq 50 -1 1) ...`) at 22:08:53+03:00 to log Remaining values each second.
Confirmed completion by seeing exactly 50 lines plus tail entries down to `Remaining:01` in `sleep_50_background.log`.
